product_name: LOOPSFresh Face Trio Hydrogel Face & Eye Mask 3 Piece Set
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeFace Face Trio by LOOPS includes 2 specially formulated hydrogel face masks and 1 hydrogel eye mask. This set includes Weekly Reset to rejuvenate, Fresh Peel to resurface and smooth skin, and Hyper Eyes to brighten and combat dark circles — your go-to for refreshed, radiant skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsFresh Peel: Exfoliate, Polish, Clarify, BrightenHyper Eyes: Softens Appearance of Dark Spots, Promotes Even Complexion, Revives Dull Skin, Boosts LuminosityWeekly Reset: Hydrating, Brightening, Helps Reduce Wrinkles, NourishingFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesSynthetic FragrancesDrying AlcoholMineral OilIncludesFresh Peel Resurfacing Hydrogel Face MaskWeekly Reset Rejuvenating Hydrogel Face MaskHyper Eyes Dark Circles Hydrogel Under Eye MaskItem 2643888How To UseStart by cleansing skin and gently patting dry.Tear package at notch to open.Apply the textured side of the mask to face, starting with the top half and then bottom.Peel off remaining film. Leave on for a LOOP (10 minutes), then peel off.Tap remaining serum into skin for full ingredient absorption.Use as directed.IngredientsFresh Peel: Water (Aqua/Eau), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Allantoin, Cellulose Gum, Glucomannan, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Dextrin, Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Ethylhexylglycerin, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Alpha-Arbutin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Seed Powder, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Tranexamic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Morus Alba Root Extract, Phytic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Fruit Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract, Chrysanthellum Indicum Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Extract, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract.Weekly Reset: Water (Aqua/Eau), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Polyglycerin-3, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Panthenol, Hydroxyacetophenonem, Allantoin, Betaine, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Cellulose Gum, Glucomannan, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Chloride, Dextrin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Adenosine, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Honey Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Pueraria Thunbergiana Root Extract, Ulmus Asphodeloides Root Extract, Angelica Acutiloba Root Extract, Sodium Polyacrylate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start by cleansing skin and gently patting dry.Tear package at notch to open.Apply the textured side of the mask to face, starting with the top half and then bottom.Peel off remaining film. Leave on for a LOOP (10 minutes), then peel off.Tap remaining serum into skin for full ingredient absorption.Use as directed.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: Ive been using Loops for about years and they are amazing!!! They make my skin glow and feel refreshed!

reviews.headline: Amazing product for so cheap
reviews.comments:
I've been using the Loops Weekly Reset Hydrogel Eye Patches for a few weeks now, and honestly, I'm hooked. I wasn't expecting a huge difference, but wow — these little patches actually work. The moment I put them on, they feel super cooling and refreshing, like an instant wake-up call for my eyes.

What I love most is how they help with puffiness and those stubborn dark circles. I tend to look pretty tired in the mornings, but after using these, my under-eye area looks much more awake and brighter. They're gentle too — I have sensitive skin and I haven't had any irritation at all. Just smooth, hydrated skin.

reviews.headline: I love Loops - they're a splurge!
reviews.comments: I have used the weekly reset mask from this package. As promised, it stays put on your face so long as you don't have facial hair. It is comfortable to wear, and a nice experience. I use the left over serum in the package as an additional touch up.

reviews.headline: I love the mix
reviews.comments: Finally a place that knows you need variety of type in the set! I love you get 2 different kinds of masks. It's perfect.

reviews.headline: A spa day in a set!!!!
reviews.comments: I absolutely loved the Fresh Face Trio Hydrogel Face & Eye Mask 3 Piece Set! It's a perfect little self-care treat that leaves your skin feeling refreshed, soothed, and noticeably more hydrated.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: My go to trio for a weekend reset! The masks are even more perfect for summer bc they feel so cool. I like this one the best bc the eye masks help with undereye dark circles, the face masks smooth and resurface and also hydrate. You can have yourself a nice lil weekend w these

reviews.headline: I would definitely recommend!!!
reviews.comments: The masks are so hydrating and glowy. I have used all of the in my first week of getting them! The  under eye masks I would say are the best in this kit because they work so well. I have got this about 3 times already and have even got this for my friends too!

reviews.headline: Definitely worth it
reviews.comments: I absolutely love how the sheet mask is definitely from the regular one that always slip off. And the under eye patch does actually brighten the under eyes.

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: Trio Hydrogel Mask Set feels super luxurious and makes for a great self-care moment. The masks are  hydrating, and stay in place really well, which help with puffiness.

reviews.headline: On the go
reviews.comments: Great for long travel!

reviews.headline: my face feels refreshed
reviews.comments: I have tried loop masks before but I really love this trio! It leaves my face looking so smooth and hydrated and honestly it's very aesthetically looking.

reviews.headline: Best ever!
reviews.comments: I love this! I always used to have dry under eyes and they were super flaky, but when I tried this for like one week, it got so much better! It felt a little expensive at first but once you try it, you will never go back to those collection or those target cheap brand onesnn

reviews.headline: Fresh face trio
reviews.comments: The Loops Fresh Face Trio is a game-changer. Each mask leaves my skin feeling refreshed, hydrated, and noticeably brighter. I love how soothing they are, especially after a long day. The packaging is sleek and travel-friendly, and the results are immediate. My skin feels clean, plump, and pampered. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I have been using loops for a year already and i am in so in love with this thank you loops it has improved my skin a lot

reviews.headline: So Plumping!
reviews.comments: Love the Fresh Face Trio. It's so hydrating and plumping, really great for a weekly reset. Always stock up on this. All three products are amazing!

reviews.headline: A great kit to reset my skin!
reviews.comments: I love the Weekly Reset mask to reset my skin after a long week! It is so soothing and refreshing. I also really like the way the mask fits on my big head.

reviews.headline: self care essential
reviews.comments: this trio is an essential in my self care routine. every Sunday i treat myself to a bath and a mask and these are always in my rotation!

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: Make me feel my skin so perfect✨

reviews.headline: Love this Trio!
reviews.comments: Love these! A perfect gift or to use for yourself! Love something like this when my skin needs an extra boost and it does just that! Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and looking glowy!

reviews.headline: Definitely recommend!!
reviews.comments: This product is sooo good!! It makes my skin so tight and firm, highly reccomend! Also makes you so glowy but not looking oily, like a glow from within. If you wanted new face masks, i highly reccomend buying these ones!!

rollup.name: Fresh Face Trio Hydrogel Face & Eye Mask 3 Piece Set
